definition: Yueyang prefecture-level city in Hunan
surname Yue
wife's parents and paternal uncles
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Yueyang prefecture level city in Hunan

Yueyang Tower, famous beauty spot in Yueyang, north Hunan, overlooking Dongting Lake 洞庭湖[Dong4 ting2 Hu2]/one of three famous pagodas in China along with Yellow Crane Tower 黃鶴樓|黄鹤楼[Huang2 he4 Lou2] in Wuhan, Hubei and Tengwang Tower 滕王閣|滕王阁[Teng2 wang2 Ge2] in Nanchang, Jiangxi

Yueyang prefecture in Hunan
On Yueyang Tower (1045), essay by Song writer Fan Zhongyan 范仲淹[Fan4 Zhong4 yan1]

sentences.english: With its special location of Yueyang, its dialect is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 岳陽由於其地理位置的特殊性，方言十分複雜。

sentences.english: You may visit Yueyang and Dongting Lake.
sentences.chinese: 您在去北京途中可以遊覽岳陽和洞庭湖。

sentences.english: Regarding this time's Yoyang, emancipates the mind to come meantime on.
sentences.chinese: 對於這個時期的岳陽來說，解放思想來得恰逢其時。

sentences.english: Yueyang is a city by Dongting Lake in north Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 岳陽是湖南北部洞庭湖畔的一座城市。

sentences.english: Harmony is one of the six targets that develop Yueyang into a strong city.
sentences.chinese: 社會和諧是岳陽發展的六個強市目標之一。

sentences.english: Torrential rains hit Yueyang Thursday night, causing landslides in the village of Guanshan.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨襲擊岳陽週四晚，導致關山村山體滑坡。
